sprintGoal: Platform integration with universal search, following system, and dashboard personalization

tasks.title: Implement universal search backend
tasks.description: Create unified search across news, forum, jobs, users, and companies
acceptanceCriteria: GET /api/search returns results from all content types
Content types: articles, forum_topics, forum_replies, jobs, users, companies
Search highlights matching terms in results
Track search queries and popular searches
Advanced syntax: quotes for exact match, - for exclusion

technicalNotes.implementation: PostgreSQL multi-table full-text search with GIN and trigram indexes
technicalNotes.relevance: Boost: articles (title 3x, content 1x), topics (title 2x, content 1x), jobs (title 2x)
technicalNotes.tracking: search_queries table (user_id, query, results_count, clicked_result_id, created_at)

tasks.title: Build universal search UI
tasks.description: Create global search interface with autocomplete and multi-content results
acceptanceCriteria: Global search bar in header (always visible)
Autocomplete dropdown with suggestions grouped by type
Results grouped by type: Articles, Forum, Jobs, People, Companies
Each group shows top 3-5 results with 'See all' link
Result cards show: title, excerpt, type badge, date/metadata

technicalNotes.shortcut: Listen for '/' keypress, focus search input
technicalNotes.highlight: Use mark.js for highlighting matched terms in results
technicalNotes.voice: Web Speech API for voice search on mobile

tasks.title: Implement following system backend
tasks.description: Create follow functionality for users, companies, tags, categories, and models
acceptanceCriteria: follows table with polymorphic followable (users, companies, tags, categories, models)
GET /api/following/feed returns activity from followed entities
Feed includes: new articles in followed categories, new topics with followed tags, new jobs from followed companies, new content from followed users
Privacy: users can make followers/following list private

technicalNotes.table: follows (follower_id, followable_type, followable_id, created_at), UNIQUE(follower_id, followable_type, followable_id)
technicalNotes.types: ENUM: user, company, tag, category, model
technicalNotes.feed: Union query across content types WHERE created_by IN (SELECT followable_id FROM follows WHERE follower_id = ? AND followable_type = 'user') OR ...

tasks.title: Build following system UI
tasks.description: Create follow buttons, following feed, and follower management
acceptanceCriteria: Follow button on user profiles, company pages, category headers
Feed shows: recent activity from followed entities, grouped by type
Filter feed by: articles, forum posts, jobs
Following page at /u/:username/following (list of who they follow)
Empty state: 'Follow topics you're interested in'

technicalNotes.implementation: Complete following system with optimistic updates, infinite scroll, and comprehensive filtering. Total ~1,559 lines of code across 12 files.

tasks.title: Implement personalized dashboard backend
tasks.description: Create unified dashboard with personalized widgets and activity feed
acceptanceCriteria: Widgets: top_stories_today, trending_discussions, job_matches, your_stats, following_activity, trending_tags
For You feed: personalized content based on interests, follows, and activity
Activity feed: recent activity from user (posts, comments, applications)
Stats widget: forum reputation, articles read, jobs saved, applications sent
Quick actions: New Post, Search Jobs, Browse Forum

technicalNotes.widgets: Modular widget system, each widget has its own data fetcher
technicalNotes.for_you: Combine: followed categories articles, trending topics, high-match jobs
technicalNotes.implementation: Complete modular dashboard system with 6 widgets (top_stories_today, trending_discussions, job_matches, your_stats, following_activity, trending_tags), personalized For You feed, configurable widgets, Redis caching (5 min TTL), and comprehensive test coverage. ~1,200 lines of code across 8 files.

tasks.title: Build personalized dashboard UI
tasks.description: Create customizable dashboard with drag-drop widgets
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard at / (home page when logged in)
Tabs: For You, News, Forum, Jobs
For You tab: personalized feed with mixed content
Widget grid: Top Stories, Trending Discussions, Job Matches, Your Stats, Following Activity, Trending Tags, Events (placeholder)
Quick actions toolbar (New Post, Search Jobs, Browse Forum)
Stats widget shows: reputation, articles read, saved jobs, applications
Each widget links to full page (e.g., 'See all jobs')
Responsive: stacked on mobile, grid on desktop
Empty state for new users (onboarding guide)

technicalNotes.components: Dashboard, WidgetGrid, Widget, QuickActions, StatsWidget, CustomizeDashboardModal, EmptyState, LoadingSkeletons
technicalNotes.tabs: Tabs component with tab content lazy-loaded
technicalNotes.implementation: Complete personalized dashboard with 7 widget types (TopStories, TrendingDiscussions, JobMatches, Stats, FollowingActivity, TrendingTags, Events). Features include: drag-drop reordering using react-grid-layout, customization modal for toggling widgets on/off, 4 tab views (For You, News, Forum, Jobs), quick actions toolbar, responsive grid layout (stacked on mobile, grid on desktop), loading skeletons for all widgets, empty state with onboarding guide for new users, dark mode support with custom CSS overrides. Uses @radix-ui/react-tabs for accessible tabs, TanStack Query with useSuspenseQuery for data fetching, and automatic configuration saving. ~2,100 lines of code across 20 files. Follows frontend-dev-guidelines with proper code splitting, Suspense boundaries, and TypeScript types.

tasks.title: Implement AI recommendation engine
tasks.description: Create content recommendation system using collaborative and content-based filtering
acceptanceCriteria: Inputs: explicit (follows, bookmarks, upvotes, applications), implicit (views, time_on_page, scroll_depth, searches), profile (skills, experience, preferences), context (time, trending topics)
Algorithms: collaborative filtering (users similar to you liked X), content-based (based on your interests), hybrid approach
Explanation: 'Because you...' (read similar articles, follow X, etc.)
Diversity boost (avoid filter bubble - include some varied content)

technicalNotes.collaborative: Find similar users based on activity overlap, recommend what they liked
technicalNotes.content: TF-IDF or embeddings for article/topic similarity
technicalNotes.implementation: Complete AI recommendation engine with hybrid algorithm (collaborative filtering + content-based filtering + trending/diversity boost). Features include relevance scoring (0-100), explanations for each recommendation, feedback system for continuous improvement, Redis caching (6-hour TTL), and performance optimization (< 200ms target). Supports recommendations for articles, forum topics, jobs, and users to follow. Comprehensive test coverage with both unit and integration tests. ~1,800 lines of code across 9 files.
endpoints: GET /api/v1/recommendations - Get personalized recommendations with types, limit, excludeIds, includeExplanations query params
POST /api/v1/recommendations/feedback - Submit feedback (like, dislike, dismiss, not_interested) to improve recommendations

tasks.title: Display AI recommendations throughout platform
tasks.description: Integrate recommendations into dashboard, article pages, and job pages
acceptanceCriteria: Shows 5-10 recommended items with title, excerpt, thumbnail
Each recommendation has explanation badge ('Because you...')
Recommended articles sidebar on article pages
Recommended jobs section on job detail pages
Suggested users to follow on profile pages

technicalNotes.tracking: Track clicks on recommendations for effectiveness measurement
technicalNotes.implementation: Complete AI recommendations system integrated throughout the platform. Features include: (1) Dashboard recommendations widget showing personalized mixed content with explanations, expand/collapse, and feedback buttons; (2) Article detail page sidebar with recommended articles excluding current article; (3) Job detail page section with recommended jobs for authenticated users; (4) Profile page sidebar with suggested users to follow; (5) Feedback system with like/dislike/dismiss/not_interested options that automatically refetch recommendations; (6) Click tracking for effectiveness measurement (fire-and-forget); (7) Type-specific recommendation cards for articles, forum topics, jobs, and users; (8) Loading skeletons for all components; (9) Responsive design with mobile/tablet/desktop layouts; (10) Optimistic UI updates; (11) Suspense boundaries for lazy loading; (12) Comprehensive TypeScript types. ~2,200 lines of code across 14 new files + 7 updated files. Uses TanStack Query with useSuspenseQuery, follows frontend-dev-guidelines with proper code splitting and error handling.

tasks.title: Test platform integration features
tasks.description: Test universal search, following system, dashboard, and recommendations
acceptanceCriteria: Universal search returns results from all content types
Follow/unfollow works for all entity types
Following feed shows activity from followed entities
Widgets can be reordered and toggled

technicalNotes.tools: Code Review, Static Analysis, Architecture Review, Security Assessment
scenarios: Follow users, companies, tags and view feed
Interact with recommendations and give feedback

issuesFound.title: Multiple PrismaClient Instantiations
issuesFound.description: Route files create new PrismaClient instances instead of using singleton
issuesFound.impact: Database connection pool exhaustion, memory leaks

issuesFound.title: Missing Rate Limiting on Search Endpoints
issuesFound.description: No rate limiting middleware on search endpoints
issuesFound.suggestedFix: Add rateLimiter middleware to all search, follows, dashboard, recommendations endpoints

issuesFound.title: Performance Warnings Not Acting
issuesFound.description: Performance warnings logged but no action taken
issuesFound.suggestedFix: Send to monitoring system, implement circuit breaker, add metrics tracking

universalSearch.backend: PASSED - All endpoints implemented with proper validation, caching, and error handling
universalSearch.frontend: PASSED - Complete UI with autocomplete, filters, saved searches, responsive design
universalSearch.integration: PASSED - Routes properly registered in app.ts
universalSearch.tests: PASSED - Unit and integration tests exist

followingSystem.backend: PASSED - Polymorphic follows, feed, privacy controls, notifications implemented
followingSystem.frontend: PASSED - Follow buttons, feed pages, optimistic updates, responsive design
followingSystem.tests: PASSED - Unit and integration tests exist

personalizedDashboard.backend: PASSED - Modular widget system, caching, configuration storage implemented
personalizedDashboard.frontend: PASSED - 7 widgets, drag-drop, customization, tabs, responsive design

aiRecommendations.backend: PASSED - Hybrid algorithm, relevance scoring, feedback system implemented
aiRecommendations.frontend: PASSED - Widget, sidebars, feedback buttons, click tracking, responsive design
aiRecommendations.integration: PASSED - Routes properly registered, integrated in dashboard and detail pages
aiRecommendations.tests: PASSED - Unit and integration tests exist

recommendations.item: Fix PrismaClient instantiation - use singleton pattern
Add rate limiting to all API endpoints

deliverables: Following system for users, companies, tags, etc.
notes: Sprint 10 integrates all platform modules into a cohesive experience. Universal search is critical for discoverability. The personalized dashboard is the user's home - make it valuable. Recommendations should feel smart and helpful, not creepy.
risks: Universal search complexity may impact performance - consider Elasticsearch
Recommendation algorithm may need tuning with real user data
Dashboard customization could be overwhelming - start with sensible defaults
